young.interpretation: Young segments show LOW digital adoption (25.5%). Expect 20-40% agreement on digital behaviors.

middle.interpretation: Middle segments show LOW digital adoption (24.4%). Expect 20-40% agreement on digital behaviors.

elderly.interpretation: Elderly segments show LOW digital adoption (22.4%). Expect 20-40% agreement on digital behaviors.

high.interpretation: High-income segments show LOWER life satisfaction (33.3%). Expect 20-35% agreement.

middle.interpretation: Middle-income segments show LOWER life satisfaction (33.3%). Expect 20-35% agreement.

low.interpretation: Low-income segments show LOWER life satisfaction (33.3%). Expect 20-35% agreement.

young.interpretation: Young segments show LOWER environmental focus (22.4%). Expect 15-30% agreement.

middle.interpretation: Middle segments show LOWER environmental focus (22.4%). Expect 15-30% agreement.

elderly.interpretation: Elderly segments show LOWER environmental focus (19.9%). Expect 15-30% agreement.

young.interpretation: Young: MODERATE savings (31.9%), HIGHER borrowing aversion (26.7%)

middle.interpretation: Middle: MODERATE savings (31.6%), HIGHER borrowing aversion (26.8%)

elderly.interpretation: Elderly: LOWER savings focus (27.7%), HIGHER borrowing aversion (22.7%)

interpretation.young_affluent: Highest digital adoption, environmental values, financial confidence
interpretation.young_constrained: High digital, moderate environmental, financial stress impacts satisfaction
interpretation.elderly_affluent: Lower digital, moderate environmental, high satisfaction
interpretation.elderly_constrained: Low digital, lower environmental, resilience despite constraints
